greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = largest prime factor of n^n + 1.
reference: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: Hugo Pfoertner, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..123
program: (PARI) for(k=1, 24, my(x=factor(k^k+1), f=x[#x[, 1], 1]); print1(f,", ")) \\ _Hugo Pfoertner_, Aug 23 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Robert G. Wilson v_
